<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Agent Personal Schedule in Agent Schedule Application is update with timeZone of the sys_user records.</description>
        <name>Update Agent Personal Schedule TimeZone</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var agentPersonalScheduleGR = new GlideRecord("agent_events");
if(agentPersonalScheduleGR.isValid()){
	agentPersonalScheduleGR.query();
	while(agentPersonalScheduleGR.next()){
		var user_time_zone = null;
		var userId = agentPersonalScheduleGR.getValue('user');
		var userGR = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		userGR.addQuery('sys_id',userId);
		userGR.query();
		while(userGR.next()){
			user_time_zone = userGR.getValue('time_zone');
		}
		if(user_time_zone){
			var scheduleGR = new GlideRecord('cmn_schedule');
			scheduleGR.addQuery('sys_id',agentPersonalScheduleGR.getValue('personal_schedule'));
			scheduleGR.query();
			while(scheduleGR.next()){
				scheduleGR.setValue('time_zone',user_time_zone);
				scheduleGR.update();
			}
		}
	}
}]]></script>
